Content:
# üéØ Project Setup Guide

Welcome to the project! This guide will help you quickly get started by installing the required tools and configuring your local environment.

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Prerequisites

Ensure the following tools are installed on your system:

- [Rust](https://www.rust-lang.org/tools/install)
- [Solana CLI](https://docs.solana.com/cli/install-solana-cli-tools)
- [Anchor](https://anchor-lang.com/docs/installation)

> ‚ÑπÔ∏è **Recommended Anchor version:** `0.30.1`

---

## ‚úÖ Check Versions & Set Config

Verify that everything is properly installed and configured:

```bash
rustc --version             # Check Rust version
solana --version            # Check Solana CLI version
anchor --version            # Check Anchor version

solana config get           # View current Solana config
solana config set --url devnet  # Set network to devnet
```
Translation:
# üéØ Guide d'installation du projet

Bienvenue sur le projet ! Ce guide vous aidera √† d√©marrer rapidement en installant les outils requis et en configurant votre environnement local.

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Pr√©requis

Assurez-vous que les outils suivants sont install√©s sur votre syst√®me :

- [Rust](https://www.rust-lang.org/tools/install)
- [Solana CLI](https://docs.solana.com/cli/install-solana-cli-tools)
- [Anchor](https://anchor-lang.com/docs/installation)

> ‚ÑπÔ∏è **Version recommand√©e d'Anchor :** `0.30.1`

---

## ‚úÖ V√©rifier les versions & configurer

V√©rifiez que tout est correctement install√© et configur√© :

```bash
rustc --version             # V√©rifier la version de Rust
solana --version            # V√©rifier la version du Solana CLI

Content:
---

## üîê Wallet Setup

Generate and manage your wallet keys:

```bash
solana-keygen new -o ./keys/admin.json     # Generate a new keypair
solana-keygen pubkey ./keys/admin.json     # Get public key
solana balance ./keys/admin.json           # Check wallet balance
solana airdrop 5 YOUR_WALLET_ADDRESS -u devnet   # Airdrop 5 SOL to your wallet
```

---

## üì¶ Project Installation

Clone the project and install dependencies:

```bash
git clone https://github.com/project-repo.git
cd project-folder
yarn
```

---

## üîê Configuration du portefeuille

G√©n√©rez et g√©rez les cl√©s de votre portefeuille :

```bash
solana-keygen new -o ./keys/admin.json     # G√©n√©rer une nouvelle paire de cl√©s
solana-keygen pubkey ./keys/admin.json     # Obtenir la cl√© publique
solana balance ./keys/admin.json           # V√©rifier le solde du portefeuille
solana airdrop 5 YOUR_WALLET_ADDRESS -u devnet   # Airdrop de 5 SOL sur votre portefeuille
```

---

## üì¶ Installation du projet

Clonez le projet et installez les d√©pendances :

```bash
git clone https://github.com/project-repo.git
cd project-folder
yarn
```

## ‚ö° Quick Start

### üèóÔ∏è Build the Program

Compile the Anchor smart contract:

```bash
# Build the Anchor program using nightly toolchain
RUSTUP_TOOLCHAIN="nightly-2024-11-19" anchor build

# Sync all program public keys
anchor keys sync

# Rebuild if the program address in lib.rs has changed
RUSTUP_TOOLCHAIN="nightly-2024-11-19" anchor build
```

---
Translation:
---

## ‚ö° D√©marrage rapide

### üèóÔ∏è Compiler le programme

Compilez le smart contract Anchor :

```bash
# Compiler le programme Anchor en utilisant la toolchain nightly
RUSTUP_TOOLCHAIN="nightly-2024-11-19" anchor build

# Synchroniser toutes les cl√©s publiques du programme
anchor keys sync

# Recompiler si l'adresse du programme dans lib.rs a chang√©
RUSTUP_TOOLCHAIN="nightly-2024-11-19" anchor build
```

Content:
### üß™ Test on Devnet

Ensure your `Anchor.toml` uses Devnet:

```toml
[provider]
cluster = "https://api.devnet.solana.com"
```

---

### üöÄ Deploy the Program

```bash
anchor deploy
```

---

## üß™ Use CLI to Interact with the Program

## üß™ Utiliser le CLI pour interagir avec le programme

Content:
Use these CLI scripts to interact with your smart contract locally.

---

### üîπ Initialize the Program

```bash
yarn script config
```

Initializes the contract configuration.

---

### üîπ Create a Round

```bash
yarn script create -t <ROUND_TIME> -d <MIN_DEPOSIT_AMOUNT> -j <MAX_JOINER_COUNT>
Translation:
Utilisez ces scripts CLI pour interagir localement avec votre contrat intelligent.

---

### üîπ Initialiser le programme

```bash
yarn script config
```

Initialise la configuration du contrat.

---

### üîπ Cr√©er un tour

```bash
yarn script create -t <ROUND_TIME> -d <MIN_DEPOSIT_AMOUNT> -j <MAX_JOINER_COUNT>

Content:
# Example:
yarn script create -t 60 -d 100000000 -j 100
```

**Parameters:**

- `<ROUND_TIME>`: Duration of the round in seconds (e.g., `60` = 60s).
- `<MIN_DEPOSIT_AMOUNT>`: Minimum deposit in lamports (1 SOL = 1_000_000_000). Must be greater than `config.TEST_INITIAL_MIN_DEPOSIT_AMOUNT`.
- `<MAX_JOINER_COUNT>`: Maximum number of participants. Must be less than `config.TEST_INITIAL_MAX_JOINER_COUNT`.

---

### üîπ Join a Round

```bash
yarn script join -a <DEPOSIT_SOL_AMOUNT> -g <ROUND_NUMBER>

# Example:
yarn script join -a 100000000 -g 2
```
Translation:
# Exemple :
yarn script create -t 60 -d 100000000 -j 100
```

**Param√®tres :**

- `<ROUND_TIME>` : Dur√©e du tour en secondes (par exemple, `60` = 60s).
- `<MIN_DEPOSIT_AMOUNT>` : D√©p√¥t minimum en lamports (1 SOL = 1_000_000_000). Doit √™tre sup√©rieur √† `config.TEST_INITIAL_MIN_DEPOSIT_AMOUNT`.
- `<MAX_JOINER_COUNT>` : Nombre maximum de participants. Doit √™tre inf√©rieur √† `config.TEST_INITIAL_MAX_JOINER_COUNT`.

---

### üîπ Rejoindre un tour

```bash
yarn script join -a <DEPOSIT_SOL_AMOUNT> -g <ROUND_NUMBER>

# Exemple :
yarn script join -a 100000000 -g 2
```

Content:
**Parameters:**

- `<DEPOSIT_SOL_AMOUNT>`: Deposit amount in lamports (e.g., 0.1 SOL = 100_000_000).
- `<ROUND_NUMBER>`: Index of the round to join. Starts from `0`. Must be less than `total_round`.

> üïí Note: The countdown for the round starts when the second participant joins.

---

### üîπ Select Winner

```bash
yarn script winner -g <ROUND_NUMBER>

# Example:
yarn script winner -g 2
```

**Note:** Only call this after the round time has fully elapsed.

---
Translation:
**Param√®tres :**

- `<DEPOSIT_SOL_AMOUNT>` : Montant du d√©p√¥t en lamports (par exemple, 0,1 SOL = 100_000_000).
- `<ROUND_NUMBER>` : Index du round √† rejoindre. Commence √† `0`. Doit √™tre inf√©rieur √† `total_round`.

> üïí Remarque : Le compte √† rebours pour le round commence lorsque le deuxi√®me participant rejoint.

---

### üîπ S√©lectionner le gagnant

```bash
yarn script winner -g <ROUND_NUMBER>

# Exemple :
yarn script winner -g 2
```

**Remarque :** N'appelez cette commande qu'apr√®s que le temps du round soit enti√®rement √©coul√©.

---

Content:
### üîπ Claim Winnings

```bash
yarn script claim -g <ROUND_NUMBER>

# Example:
yarn script claim -g 2
```

**Note:** This must be run by the winning wallet after the winner has been selected.
